name: Benny The Bulbasaur
description:
Benny the Bulbasaur is a lv. 100 Bulbasaur with these stats and can learn these moves, He is facing off against a lv. 100 Scizor with a these stats.

But Benny the Bulbasaur can only use 4 moves against his enemy, please calculate the maximum expected value of the damage (HP-wise, total of the four moves) Benny can dish out against the scizor rounded to the nearest integer. The flag format is stuyctf{maximum_expected_damage} (Also using gen V type effectiveness, beware of that)

P.S. the formula for damage can be found here and for the purpose of this problem, "other" is 1 and the random multiplier is also 1. Also assume no critical hits.

P.P.S. the moves file is formatted as the following: Name Type Physical/Special BasePower Accuracy

P.P.P.S. In case you don't know what an expected value is: Suppose random variable x can take on value of a with probability p and it can take on value b with probability q, the expected value of x is equivalent to a * p + b * q
hint: I hope you're not doing this by hand.
